mapper.select: select * from office.attachment where isdel = 0 and id = (select attachment from office.article where isdel = 0 and id = #{id});
mapper.update: update office.attachment set name = #{name}, location = #{location}, type = #{type}, keyentry = #{keyentry} where isdel = 0 and id = (select attachment from office.article where isdel = 0 and id = #{id});
mapper.delete: delete from office.attachment where id = (select attachment from office.article where isdel = 0 and id = #{id});
